original_text: And the Lord's anger was kindled against Israel, and he made them wander in the wilderness forty years, until all the generation that had done evil in the sight of the Lord was gone.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이스라엘에게 진노하사 그들에게 사십 년 동안 광야에 방황하게 하셨으므로 여호와의 목전에 악을 행한 그 세대가 마침내는 다 끊어졌느니라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord's anger was kindled against Israel
and he made them wander in the wilderness forty years
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 사십 년 동안 광야에서 방황하게 하셨다

sentences.original_text: until all the generation was gone
that had done evil in the sight of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그 세대는 여호와 보시기에 악을 행한 자들이었다
